text: let me quickly paint a picture of the
future you're walking down the sidewalk
on a beautiful day and you have your AR
glasses on and you're looking chic and
cool and everybody has them on so you
don't stand out at all
meanwhile you're scrolling live streams
right there in front of your eyes and
you happen upon a live stream where you
see somebody who's walking right into
oncoming traffic
and you think to yourself oh no this
person's such a fool and then you get
hit by a car because you're walking
directly into oncoming traffic and
you're looking at a video feed of
yourself about to hit a car and now
you're dead I think this is novel worthy
you can write a sci-fi the future the
future we deserve
